name: Thomas Brown
description: I am man affectionate,dependable,hard worker,i love children,faithful,honest,down to earth caring man who seeks to enhance life through a relationship. I love spending time with my work. I have a great sense of humor, I like to share interesting conversation. I strive to turn life’s experiences into positive outcomes. I feel fortunate in that I am in good health, I like to feel emotionally close while maintaining my individuality.I have a good personality,kind heart, a lot of love to give to the right woman. I’m just a human being trying to find a good woman to spend time with and enjoy each others
